Html:
Hi,
I see that CustomUpdateEngine don't work on Windows Server 2012.
It needs .NET Framework 3.5, that have not present in Windows 2012.

Is there any way to make Custom Update work on Windows Server 2012 without .NET Framework 3.5 installing?
No sorry, for now CustomUpdate only target the .Net 2.0 (.Net 3.5 can run it). The only way to solve your problem, at short term, is to install .Net 3.5 on the server.

Hello again,

Is there any news about this issue?
